doc.field: Series V contains case files and legal documents including: affidavits, depositions, motions, District Court and appellate briefs, exhibits, appendices, court transcripts. Cases found in this series address various union disputes and date mostly from the late 1970s to the early 1990s. Major cases found in this series include The Drywall Tapers Local 1974 v. Operative Plasterers Local 530; Drywall Tapers' Funds v. Nastasi White, Circle Industries, Component Assembly Systems, Inc., Bernie Wolff Construction, Co.; Petramale v. Local 17 & Laborers' International Union of North America (LIUNA); and Rodonich et. al. v. House Wreckers Union Local 95 of LIUNA, LIUNA, et. al.
More detailed notes outlining the principal cases in this series and the types of documents in each casefile can be found in the detailed inventory on file.
Some materials (Box 39, Box 51A) have been moved to quarantine in July 2017 due to mold and may not be accessible to researchers.
As of October 2017 Box 56 is missing.
